ElectricTariff.urdb_rate_name: RTR-1 Residential TOU Rate (RS-1 w/ TOU Rider)

urdb_response.label: 62c44d84924e2352a30de5d6
urdb_response.name: RTR-1 Residential TOU Rate (RS-1 w/ TOU Rider)
urdb_response.description:
For service for all domestic purposes in individually metered dwelling units and in duplexes and triplexes, including the separately metered non-commercial facilities of a residential Customer (i.e., garages, water pumps, etc.). Also for service to commonly-owned
facilities of condominium, cooperative and homeowners' associations as set forth on Sheet No. 8.211, Rider CU. This is an optional
rider available to residential customers served under the RS-1 Rate Schedule subject to availability of meters. Customers taking
service under RTR-1 are not eligible for service under Rate Schedule RLP.
urdb_response.energycomments: Adjustments = Fuel Charge + Storm charge + Conservation + Capacity + Environmental
